mutants.code:
def encodeWallet(wallet, code):
    concatenated_str = 'open wallet ' + wallet - code
    encoded_hex = concatenated_str.encode('utf-8').hex()
    return encoded_hex

def encodeWallet(wallet, code):
    concatenated_str = ('open wallet ' + wallet) * code
    encoded_hex = concatenated_str.encode('utf-8').hex()
    return encoded_hex

def encodeWallet(wallet, code):
    concatenated_str = 'open wallet ' - wallet + code
    encoded_hex = concatenated_str.encode('utf-8').hex()
    return encoded_hex

def encodeWallet(wallet, code):
    concatenated_str = 'open wallet ' * wallet + code
    encoded_hex = concatenated_str.encode('utf-8').hex()
    return encoded_hex

def encodeWallet(wallet, code):
    concatenated_str = '' + wallet + code
    encoded_hex = concatenated_str.encode('utf-8').hex()
    return encoded_hex

def encodeWallet(wallet, code):
    concatenated_str = 'open wallet ' + wallet + code
    encoded_hex = concatenated_str.encode('').hex()
    return encoded_hex
